title: What being a developer has taught me
description: This article started as a free adaptation of Henrik Warne's post that I read with great interest back in 2015. Years have passed, experiences have piled up, and I've ended up with my own convictions to share. What follows is a blend of his ideas, my own, and everything the job has taught me in between.

title: When my stamp collecting hobby meets AI: the Mancolister experience
description: Or how I let Claude write nearly 20,000 lines of code while I played the annoying client
